title: Mars Transit in the 6th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits your 6th house, energy targets work discipline, competition, and problem-solving. You feel driven to tackle challenges, outperform rivals, and correct inefficiencies. This phase strengthens resilience and courage in demanding routines, but impatience can spark conflicts with coworkers or subordinates. Health requires attention, especially inflammation or stress-related strain. Productive results come from channeling intensity into structured effort, clear priorities, and consistent habits rather than confrontational tactics.

sections.heading: Career & Work
points: Strong drive to resolve work issues
Ability to push through heavy workloads

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Need to separate duty from emotion

sections.heading: Finance & Assets
points: Expenses linked to tools or health

closing: This Mars transit sharpens discipline and competitiveness. Structured effort and measured reactions turn pressure into progress.
